name: Froslass
description: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees F. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.effect: During hail, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in snow.

abilities.name: Cursed Body
abilities.effect: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
abilities.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
